item.title: Welcome to DevOps Signals Blog
item.description: Welcome to DevOps Signals, my brand new Blog about DevOps, Agile and various IT-related topics. My name is Igor Antonacci, a seasoned DevOps Engineer passionate about Application Lifecycle Management, IT-Operations’ topics, Cloud and IT Security especially in the Enterprise world.
